experience.description: Leading the family office of Peyush Bansal.Sector agnostic with special interest in consumer and consumer tech, deep tech, enterprise / SMB SaaS, B2B Commerce / Marketplaces.Stage: pre-seed to Series AWe are active investors leveraging the in-house expertise at Lenskart - and beyond - to support our portfolio startups to become scalable and enduring global businesses.Portfolio includes - Shiprocket, IndMoney, GIVA, Slice, Apna Mart, Jiffy, Leverage Edu, etc.Building a great startup?
